item.title: How do I get this to loop
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

[quote="+ Saint +, post:6, topic:182651"][quote author=Nets8 link=topic=244313.msg2062694#msg2062694 date=1203373717]

while (woodcutting == true) //you'll have to make this boolean ~Nets8 { if (WCTimer == 0) { //fixed your timer ~Nets8 if (TreeHP == 0) { AddGlobalObj(TreeX, TreeY, 9661, 0, 10); sendMessage("This tree has run out of logs"); ResetWC(); return false; } else { } }

There you go And also, why is that a boolean? o.o
[/quote]
HAHAHAHAHA!
Learn Loops

http://www.leepoint.net/notes-java/flow/loops/loops.html[/quote]

Um, you learn loops? Rofl.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I get this to loop
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

while (woodcutting == true) //you'll have to make this boolean ~Nets8 { if (WCTimer == 0) { //fixed your timer ~Nets8 if (TreeHP == 0) { AddGlobalObj(TreeX, TreeY, 9661, 0, 10); sendMessage("This tree has run out of logs"); ResetWC(); return false; } else { } }

There you go And also, why is that a boolean? o.o

if (WCTimer <= 0) { if (TreeHP == 0) { AddGlobalObj(TreeX, TreeY, 9661, 0, 10); sendMessage("This tree has run out of logs"); ResetWC(); return false; } else {
